api_key.description: API key to authenticate with Portainer. Mutually exclusive with 'user' and 'password'.

api_password.description: Password for authentication. Must be used together with 'user'.

api_user.description: Username for authentication. Must be used together with 'password'.

endpoint.description: URL of the Portainer instance (e.g. https://portainer.example.com). '/api' will be appended automatically if missing.

skip_ssl_verify.description: Verify the SSL/TLS certificate for the Portainer endpoint

output_path.description: Path on local disk where the backup .tar.gz should be saved

max_retries.description: Maximum retries for each service check.

revision.description: Expected revision (image tag) of running containers/services.

services_list.description: Comma-separated list of service names (without stack prefix).

wait.description: Initial wait before the first check (seconds).

cloud_provider.description: Cloud provider name (e.g., aws, gcp, digitalocean)
Cloud provider (civo, digitalocean, linode, amazon, azure, gke)

compose_content.description: The content of the docker-compose.yml file.

manifests.description: Map of generated Kubernetes YAML manifests.

repository_authentication.description: Enable authentication for the Git repository (default: false).

force_update.description: If true, call Portainer forceupdateservice endpoint for each updated service (after optional wait).

revision.description: Target image tag/revision to set on services and optionally on stack ENV in stack_env_var.

services_list.description: Comma-separated list of service names (without stack prefix).

stack_env_var.description: Name of stack environment variable to update.

update_revision.description: If true, also update stack ENV variable in stack_env_var to the provided revision.

wait.description: Seconds to wait before force-updating a service (only when force_update = true).

version.description: Swarm node version required for update operation

data.description: Base64-encoded secret data (stored in Terraform state).

data_wo.description: Write-only secret data (supports ephemeral values; not stored in Terraform state).

data_wo_version.description: Version flag for write-only data; must be set when using `data_wo` to trigger updates.

environment.description: Environment variables for the Edge Stack

force_update.description: Whether to prune unused services/networks during stack update (default: true)

pull_image.description: Whether to force pull latest images during stack update (default: true)

relative_path.description: Enable relative path volumes – also used as value for 'filesystemPath'.

webhook_url.description: Full URL of the webhook trigger

webhook_id.description: UUID of the webhook to trigger

endpoint_id.description: ID of the endpoint to snapshot. If omitted, all endpoints will be snapshotted.

group_id.description: ID of the Portainer endpoint group. Default is 1 (Unassigned).

public_ip.description: Public IP/URL used by Portainer for Published Ports (maps to PublicURL).

tag_ids.description: List of tag IDs to assign to the environment.

team_access_policies.description: Map of team IDs to role IDs (e.g. teamID -> roleID)

type.description: Environment type: 1 = Docker, 2 = Agent, 3 = Azure, 4 = Edge Agent, 5 = Kubernetes, 6 = Kubernetes via agent

user_access_policies.description: Map of user IDs to role IDs (e.g. userID -> roleID)

conflicting_keys.description: List of conflicting license keys, if any

force.description: Force attach even if there are conflicting licenses

environment_id.description: The ID of the environment (endpoint) to activate OpenAMT on.

action.description: The out-of-band action to execute on the device (e.g. poweron, poweroff, reset).

device_id.description: The ID of the AMT managed device.

http_enabled.description: Whether HTTP should be enabled (true) or disabled (false)

additional_files.description: List of additional Compose file paths to use when deploying from Git repository.

force_update.description: Whether to prune unused services/networks during stack update (default: true)

prune.description: Whether to prune unused services/networks during stack update (default: false)

pull_image.description: Whether to force pull latest images during stack update (default: true)

repository_password_wo.description: Write-only repository password (supports ephemeral values; not stored in Terraform state).

repository_url_wo.description: Write-only repository URL (supports ephemeral values; not stored in Terraform state).

repository_wo_version.description: Version flag for write-only repository credentials; increment to trigger recreation.

webhook_url.description: Full URL of the webhook trigger

webhook_id.description: UUID of the webhook to trigger

enabled.description: Enable or disable the global debug log

role.description: Membership role: 1 = team leader, 2 = regular member

certificate.description: Type of TLS certificate: one of 'ca', 'cert', 'key'

file_path.description: Path to the local TLS file to upload

folder.description: Folder name where the TLS file will be stored

team_id.description: Optional Portainer team ID. Only applicable for standard users (role = 2).

initialized.description: Whether the admin user has been initialized via this resource.

password.description: Password for the admin account. Only used during initial bootstrap.

username.description: Username of the admin account to initialize (defaults to 'admin').

edge_stack_id.description: Edge Stack ID for triggering edge stack GitOps update

stack_id.description: Stack ID for triggering stack GitOps update

token.description: Webhook token for service restart webhook
